email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Verify Your PayPal Account Now

Dear Valued PayPal Customer,

We are writing to inform you that we have noticed some suspicious activity on your PayPal account. In order to protect your account and prevent any unauthorized access, we kindly request that you verify your account information immediately.

To verify your account, please click on the link below and follow the instructions provided:

[Phishing Link]

Please note that failure to verify your account within the next 24 hours may result in temporary suspension of your PayPal account. We take the security of our customers very seriously and want to ensure that your account remains safe and secure.

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team. Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
PayPal Security Team
